game.name: The Stanley Parable: Ultra Deluxe
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The Stanley Parable: Ultra Deluxe is an expanded re-imagining of 2013's The Stanley Parable. You will play as Stanley, and you will not play as Stanley. You will make a choice, and you will become powerless. You are not here to win. The Stanley Parable is a game that plays you.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Stanley Parable: Ultra Deluxe is an expanded re-imagining of 2013's The Stanley Parable. You will play as Stanley, and you will not play as Stanley. You will make a choice, and you will become powerless. You are not here to win. The Stanley Parable is a game that plays you.

reviewHighlights.text: As I'm currently waiting for my ten years to pass, I want to reflect on this masterpiece of a game. Nearly three of those years have passed and after...
Stanley really liked the game. In fact Stanley absolutely loved the game. He found it both funny and deeply insightful, he loved every second he spent...
